DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter Immunotherapy House Dust Mite Allergoid
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Trial of Immunotherapy With House Dust Mite Allergoid
DOC.detailed_description: A multicentre randomized placebo-controlled double-blind clinical trial for evaluation of safety and efficacy of a specific immunotherapy with an aluminium hydroxide-adsorbed allergoid preparation of house dust mite (Dermatophagoides pteronyssinus) in patients with rhinitis/rhinoconjunctivitis and/or allergic asthma bronchiale
DOC.criteria: Positive SPT Positive EAST Positive specific provocation test Serious chronic diseases other perennial allergies
